text:
@DavidBrodyCBN @realDonaldTrump I mean, if you’re so desperate to inflate numbers that you round up to the nearest 10,000… then yeah, he drew “10,000.”
Of course, the realistic way to look at it is that fewer than 6200 were dumb enough to risk COVID-19 exposure just to see an idiot drink a glass of water.
